    • Method Detail

      • getAllGlosaryTopics

        public static java.util.List<HelpTopic> getAllGlosaryTopics(java.lang.String moduleInstance,
                                                            Site site)
                                                     throws DgException
        Loads all glossary topics from DB. Both parameters are used to filter results and can be null, but be careful with Admin and User help instances. Glossary topics are with topicType=TYPE_GLOSSARY
        Parameters:
        moduleInstance - can be null, but use correct value to not mess with admin and user helps.
        siteId - can be null.
        Returns:
        list of help topics with topicType=TYPE_GLOSSARY
        Throws:
        DgException

      • searchGlossary

        public static java.util.List<HelpTopic> searchGlossary(java.util.List<java.lang.String> keyWords,
                                                       java.lang.String moduleInstance,
                                                       Site site,
                                                       java.lang.String locale)
                                                throws DgException
        Search glossary. Tries to match keywords in title and in body.
        Parameters:
        keyWords - list of strings that will be used in LIKE operation. can be null
        moduleInstance - help module instance name, can be null
        siteId - digi site ID- value of siteId field, can be null.
        locale - language code to search in
        Returns:
        list of found glossary items.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • getGlosaryTopic

        public static HelpTopic getGlosaryTopic(java.lang.Long id)

        Loads glossary topic object by ID.
        Parameters:
        id - pk in db.
        Returns:

        Throws:
